events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving collision with another vehicle at an intersection during rush hour.
Claim has been classified under Auto Accident category due to the involvement of a personal vehicle in a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to the claim to ensure timely processing and customer communication.
The customer received formal acknowledgement of the claim submission and information about next steps.
Request sent to customer for police report, photographs of damages, and vehicle registration papers.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including police report and multiple photos showing the extent of car damage.
Investigation team began assessment of the collision details and contacted witnesses to verify account.
Investigation concluded after reviewing all evidence confirming liability and estimating damage repair costs.
A settlement proposal outlining repair cost coverage and terms was sent to the customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement amount and expressed satisfaction with the handling so far.
Approval was granted to proceed with the payment based on agreed settlement terms and investigation outcomes.
Payment was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the vehicle repair expenses.
The insurance claim was closed after full settlement payment and confirmation from the customer on repair completion.
All claim files and documents were archived according to company policy for record keeping and future reference.
